column1: You can purchase bitcoin from exchanges that require your personal information (KYC) or exchanges that do not (noKYC).
To understand the tradeoffs click here. I highly recommend noKYC.
You can also earn bitcoin through work and everyday purchases.

column3: Azteco is Bitcoin for everybody. Go to your local store and buy a top up voucher just like the ones you're used to. Enter your Voucher number and Bitcoin address, and the Bitcoin arrives on your phone instantly.
Buy and sell bitcoin for fiat (or other cryptocurrencies) privately and securely using Bisq's peer-to-peer network and open-source desktop software. No registration required.
column4: My favorite decentralized exchange. Have used it multiple times to get noKYC sats without issue

column3: Global peer-to-peer (P2P) Bitcoin trading platform that doesn’t hold funds.

CoinFlip, the world’s leading bitcoin ATM operator,
makes it so flippin’ easy to buy and sell bitcoin
via cash, card, or bank transfer.
column4: Use http://textverified.com to provide a phone number that isn’t your own. This is how you buy noKYC sats from CoinFlip ATMs

column3: Swan is a great way to build your Bitcoin stack, with automated Bitcoin savings plans and instant purchases. Serving clients of any size, from $10 to $10M+.
column4: One of the first places I started buying bitcoin. Wish it was noKYC. Click my referral link to get $10 of free BTC

column3: Allows you to buy Bitcoin with as little as $1.
column4: Use my referral link to get $5

column3: River is a simple and secure platform to buy Bitcoin for the long-term investor.
column4: Use my referral link to receive 1 week of zero-fee orders for up to $10,000

column3: Send and receive money instantly. Buy bitcoin. Get paid in bitcoin.
column4: We both get $5 if you use my referral link

column3: Helping bring Bitcoiners together across all locations, industries and skill sets.
column4: Excellent way to find Bitcoin-related jobs

column3: Debit card that allows you to choose to get 1-1.5% flat rate back on your purchase, or spin to win up to 100% back or more on every purchase.
column4: Been using this card for more than a year now. Love it! Use my referral link to sign up for this bitcoin rewards card and get 5,000 sats

column3: Earn free money when you shop. Lolli gives you free bitcoin or cash when you shop at over 1,000 stores.
column4: Using Lolli with Fold is a game changer. You get tons of sats back. We both earn $5 with your first purchase through Lolli and I earn $1 when you sign up
